sentence.Network_en: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

sentence.Network_en: The Bundesbank's seemingly impregnable position has begun to weaken.
sentence.Network_cn: 德意志联邦银行看似不可撼动的地位开始削弱了。

sentence.Network_en: She was rich, beautiful and seemingly ageless.
sentence.Network_cn: 她富有而美丽，永远显得那么年轻。

list.abs: Most man likes the receiving letter , but seemingly nobody likes writing the letter ., 多数人喜欢收到信件 , 但似乎没有人喜欢写信.

entry.tran: 貌似，看似(但可能并非如此)
entry.def: If something is seemingly the case, you mean that it appears to be the case, even though it may not really be so.

example.ex: A seemingly endless line of trucks waits in vain to load up.
example.tran: 一眼望不到头的一长列卡车眼巴巴地等着装货。

example.ex: ...bread made from a seemingly limitless variety of ingredients.
example.tran: 貌似用了无数种原料制成的面包

entry.def: You use seemingly when you want to say that something seems to be true.

example.ex: He has moved to Spain, seemingly to enjoy a slower style of life...
example.tran: 他已经移居西班牙，似乎是想过一种更为悠闲的生活。

example.ex: He is a man with seemingly not an ounce of malice in him.
example.tran: 他这个人好像没有丁点儿的坏心眼。

sentences.sentence: "irrigation often produces bumper crops from apparently desert land"
"the child is seemingly healthy but the doctor is concerned"
"had been ostensibly frank as to his purpose while really concealing it"-Thomas Hardy
"on the face of it the problem seems minor"

Sentence.sentence: There is no essential difference between seemingly opposite opinions.

means.word_mean: 看来似乎, 表面上看

sentences.en: Seemingly, we can do nothing to prevent this from happening.
sentences.cn: 我们似乎没有什么办法阻止这件事发生。

jushi.chinese: 表面上看来，我们似乎没有什么办法阻止这件事发生。
